qas.question: What genre of music was was listening to by a different demographic than hard rock?
In what decade did genres begin to diverge on the basis of demographic groups?

context: Radio stations played Top 40 hits regardless of genre; although, most were in the same genre until the mid-<a1_0>1970s<a1_0/> when different forms of popular music started to target different demographic groups, such as <a0_0>disco<a0_0/> vs. hard rock. This evolved into specialized radio stations that played specific genres of music, and generally followed the evolution of artists in those genres.
